name: Operation: Pocket Sand
description:
Pocket sized tanks fighting over a pocket sized map.

WASD + Mouse for Play Mode

Mouse for Watch Mode

Plays itself!

Made (late) for MiniJam 116: Pocket Sized with the limitation "All Movement Must Be Tile Based"

Music Used - The Wasteland by Ross Bugden and Ethan Unrau https://youtu.be/5eAalHA1bAc
